name: squeegee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tool with a rubber blade and a short handle that is used for removing water from a surface such as a window or mirror after it has been washed: He carries a squeegee as he searches for drivers who want their vehicle windows cleaned. The American Red Cross was handing out cleanup kits that contained squeegees, mops, and brushes.
mihalec/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThen use a squeegee to clean off the residue.He has a dirty squeegee in his left hand, and the equally filthy palm of his right hand is extended.She uses a squeegee to push ink through a silkscreen.
